intro: Acrostichum semicordatum, commonly known as the broadleaf h养成, is a flowering plant native to the wetlands of eastern Australia. It is a perennial herb that typically grows in dense, moist environments such as swamps and riverbanks. The plant features broad, strap-like leaves that are dark green on top and lighter in color underneath. Its small, inconspicuous flowers are usually green or reddish and appear in clusters. Acrostichum semicordatum plays an important ecological role by providing habitat and food for various aquatic and terrestrial organisms.
